General.Name: ImmVRse
General.Description:
ImmVRse is a decentralised (hybrid) VR content sharing platform where brands, content creators, viewers and advertisers will collaborate to produce VR contenT. It functions as a marketplace for content creators, where brands will be able to hire them on the platform. The creators will be able to showcase their talent to the VR users, while advertisers can take the opportunity to promote their businesses to those users. 

IMV is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum network. The ImmVRse token will be utilized as a form of payments and rewards on the platform.

ICO.Description:
ImmVRse is a decentralised (hybrid) VR content sharing platform where brands, content creators, viewers and advertisers will collaborate to produce VR contenT. It functions as a marketplace for content creators, where brands will be able to hire them on the platform. The creators will be able to showcase their talent to the VR users, while advertisers can take the opportunity to promote their businesses to those users. 

IMV is an ERC20 token based on the Ethereum network. The ImmVRse token will be utilized as a form of payments and rewards on the platform.

Team:

  • FARABI SHAYOR Co-Founder & CEO 
  • LIMON RAHMAN Co-Founder & COO 
  • ADRIAN CHAN Head of Marketing 
  • MARK HIGGINS Chief Information Officer 
  • PETER GOSTINCAR Chief Technical Officer 
  • ROBIN WARE Chief Solutions Architect 

The ImmVRse ICO start and finish date are yet to be announced. The ICO token allocation represents 33% of the total token supply and will be available for a $0.20 base price. The ICO funding target/cap is set at $20,000,000. 

Token Reserve Split (66.66%):

  • 52.7% Reserved by ImmVRse,
  • 10% Team and Advisors,
  • 4% Bounty and Rewards

 

The IMV ICO features a bonus and bounty campaign.
